summary: This cable discusses ODCOIL Mexico taking the lead on Milton Lywn, avoiding KUBARK involvement. It also mentions Ernesto Abreu Gomez as a target for PERUKEN operations and informal discussions with him on the Lynn case. The cable also references a U.S. citizen LINK who told Merida police chief of a drugs case and Merida's desire to develop Chief ABRES for PEROMEN ops.
title: BRIDA MEXICO CITY
recipient: CEF, ADDP, C/CI, C/SAS S, VR Y
